author: maaraujo94
body:
#### PR description:

This PR implements an HLT filter which selects events based on multiplicity conditions of the proton tracks from the PPS detector. It is to be used in the PCL of the PPS for the calibration streams.

#### PR validation:

Filter has been run on run 2 data and has worked as expected. More information on tests done is shown [here](https://indico.cern.ch/event/1040950/contributions/4372493/attachments/2251920/3820247/0526_PPSCal.pdf)

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

PR is not a backport.

cc: @fabferro @jjhollar @kshcheli @jan-kaspar @vavati
title: Adding an HLT filter based on PPS local track multiplicity conditions for selection of events for PPS PCL
